org.orgName: Circuit Court of the United States in the Western District of Washington, Northern Division.

div1.p: INFORMATION AND COMPLAINT FOR AN INDICTABLE OFFENCE.

The information and complaint of Sam'l McClay of Vancouver, taken the 30th day of January, in teh year of Our Lord One Thousand Nine Hundred and Five, before the undersigned, Thos Crawford, Esq., one of His Majesty's Justice of the Peace in and for the said City of Vancouver, who says that at the said City of Vancouver, on or about the 15th day of January A. D. 1905 N. T. B. Pentreath at the City of Vancouver aforesaid fraudulently and unlawfully did utter a forged document as if it were genuine, knowing it was forged and with intent to defraud.
Contrary to the form of the statute in such case made and provided.
Sworn before me the day and year first above mentioned, at said City of Vancouver.

I, J. W. D & B. Farris, Police Court Clerk in and for the aforesaid City of Vancouver do certify taht this is a true copy of the information laid by S. McClay against N. T. B. Pentreaath on the above emntioned date, which information is in my possession as said Clerk.
Given under my hand and seal at the said City of Vancouver this 27th day of March A. D. 1905.
